actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Energy Department.

official_title: A bill to promote the development of enhanced tertiary oil recovery techniques.

summary.text: Enhanced Oil Recovery Amendments of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the windfall profit tax domestic crude oil produced by the holder of an interest in a front-end tertiary project on a qualified property for the period from the acquisition of the interest (or January 27, 1981, whichever is later) until the windfall profit tax that would be imposed equals the amount of the allowed expenses paid or incurred on or after April 1, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to promote the development of enhanced tertiary oil recovery techniques.
